title: ishaiyin ellaiyE
sahitya:
ishaiyin ellaiyai yAr kaNDAr enru iyambiDuvAi manamE inimai

tarum 

(ishaiyin)



anupallavi



ashaivum kuzhaivum koNDu amudamenap-pozhindu

aLaviDarkiyalAda amaivu petrilangum nam 

(ishaiyin)



caraNam



kAlam kaNDariyAda ishaiyinai mudanmudal karuttinil ninaittavar

evar tanO adan

mUlam muDivu ennum muraiyai arindiDa muyarchchi

sheivOrkk-ellAm mudanmaiyAi tigazhum 

(ishaiyin)
